review: Amazing comedy drama movie. Actors acting is real good. Specially Paresh sirs acting is superb he was looking like a real blind old man wearing black glasses . Storyline direction is superb. Golmaal one is good but now a days Golmaal series are not good only jokery is there a lot sorry to say that Rohit sir but as a audience I am saying that to you. Otherwise its a nice movie.
